actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

special_abilities.desc: A deep one can breathe air or water with equal ease.
special_abilities.name: Amphibious

special_abilities.desc: On its next turn after a deep one takes 10 or more damage from a single attack, it has advantage on its claws attack and adds +2 to damage.
special_abilities.name: Frenzied Rage

special_abilities.desc: A deep one is immune to the pressure effects of the deep ocean.
special_abilities.name: Lightless Depths

special_abilities.desc: A deep one born to a human family resembles a human child, but transforms into an adult deep one between the ages of 16 and 30.
special_abilities.name: Ocean Change
